com.codecool.shop.controller

Class ProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.controller.ProductController

  • public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is responsible for the information exchange of the html and DAO implementations.

    The class can work with both DAOMEM and DAOJDBC models, right now it uses DAOJDBC, so it gets the data from a database. And it sends the filtered informations the spark routes.
    Since:
    2017-05-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Majoross Daniel, Racz Anna, Adam Kovacs
